      • HologramConfiguration

        public HologramConfiguration​(double offX,
                             double offY,
                             double offZ,
                             double sep,
                             boolean autoCent,
                             boolean cVelocity,
                             org.bukkit.util.Vector itemVel)
        Initialize the hologram configuration
        Parameters:
        offX - the hologram offset x
        offY - the hologram offset y
        offZ - the hologram offset z
        sep - the hologram separation size
        autoCent - the hologram auto center status
        cVelocity - the hologram item velocity changer status
        itemVel - the hologram item velocity
